name: Nirmala Park
description: Nirmala Park is a well-known park located in Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu, India. It is celebrated for its serene environment and well-maintained gardens, offering visitors a peaceful retreat amidst lush greenery. The park features walking paths, seating areas, and vibrant flower beds, making it a favored spot for relaxation and leisurely strolls. Nirmala Park also provides beautiful views of the surrounding landscape, adding to its charm as a popular destination for both locals and tourists visiting Kanyakumari.
